title: Coordinate Response to Flash Flood
description: Heavy rainfall has caused flash flooding. An operator must manage the disaster response.

tasks.description: Identify flooded areas using data from street-level water sensors and camera analytics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a map overlay of the flooded zones.

tasks.description: Automatically close flooded roads in the city's navigation and traffic systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the status of multiple roads to 'closed'.

tasks.description: Identify and dispatch high-water rescue vehicles to assist stranded citizens.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches specialized units to the most critical areas.
